about_the_game:
American FKN Election immerses you in the heart of a gripping American presidential race. Choose your side—support Donald Trump or Joe Biden—and tap to collect votes, campaign funds, and public support. Your every click influences the momentum of your candidate's journey to become the Commander in Chief.

Vigorous Campaigns: Tackle the challenges of a full-scale presidential campaign. Navigate through debates, media controversies, and public appearances to sway voters in our discord channels.

Item Collection: Items to grow your collection. Every 2 and 12 hours, you get a dollar bill of multiple rarities. The dollar bill drops will change once every 7 days.

Get Achivements: Compete in the achievements run. They will get harder and harder.

Leaderboards: Compete with friends and other players to see who can effectively lead their candidate to victory.

Voice of community : Design submission via Discord! That's right! ALL our Assets are made with community effort and inspiration, come join the fun!

Dive into American FKN Election and experience the thrill of one of the most powerful electoral races. Whether you're a hardcore political follower or just looking for a fun game, this clicker challenge offers something for everyone. Ready, set, campaign!
detailed_description:
American FKN Election immerses you in the heart of a gripping American presidential race. Choose your side—support Donald Trump or Joe Biden—and tap to collect votes, campaign funds, and public support. Your every click influences the momentum of your candidate's journey to become the Commander in Chief.

Vigorous Campaigns: Tackle the challenges of a full-scale presidential campaign. Navigate through debates, media controversies, and public appearances to sway voters in our discord channels.

Item Collection: Items to grow your collection. Every 2 and 12 hours, you get a dollar bill of multiple rarities. The dollar bill drops will change once every 7 days.

Get Achivements: Compete in the achievements run. They will get harder and harder.

Leaderboards: Compete with friends and other players to see who can effectively lead their candidate to victory.

Voice of community : Design submission via Discord! That's right! ALL our Assets are made with community effort and inspiration, come join the fun!

Dive into American FKN Election and experience the thrill of one of the most powerful electoral races. Whether you're a hardcore political follower or just looking for a fun game, this clicker challenge offers something for everyone. Ready, set, campaign!
legal_notice: Our game utilizes Leonardo AI for generating a variety of assets, including marketing materials, store page visuals, in-game content, and drops. Alongside Leonardo AI, we also leverage the talents of our own in-house artists to create these assets.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.5
  • Processor: Both
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.5
  • Processor: Both
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: American FKN Election

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Any Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: i3 or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Dedicated
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Maybe

short_description: American FKN Election is a clicker game in which you click on your favorite politician and get handsomely rewarded! Every 2 and 12 hours, you get a dollar bill of multiple rarities. The dollar bill drops will change once every 7 days. Join our community and collect them all!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
